title: Angela Gots
text:
Angela Gots is an American actress, best known for her roles in "<a href="Molly%27s%20Game">Molly's Game</a>" and "<a href="Madam%20Secretary%20%28TV%20series%29">Madam Secretary</a>".
Early life.
Gots was born and raised in <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a>. She attended <a href="Congregation%20Rodeph%20Sholom%20%28Manhattan%29%23Day%20School">Rodeph Shalom School</a>.
